item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

I used your code and got this error:
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:657: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable getXPForLevel
location: class server.model.players.PlayerAssistant
c.playerXP[m] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel[0];
^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:660: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable getXPForLevel
location: class server.model.players.PlayerAssistant
c.playerXP[m] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel[10];
^

item.title: [pi] Reset All combat skills
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]For the very first error;

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:125: not a statement c.getPA().refreshSkill ;
You need the add () after ‘refreshSkill’ and before the semi-colon.

As for the rest, you added some code in the wrong spots.[/quote]
Thanks, I added it to the donator commands now and I only get one error: src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:666: reached end of file while pa
rsing
}
^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Reset All combat skills
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

I’m trying to get this command to work. The purpose of the command is to reset the combat skills when they’re ALL 99. Can you help me fix it?
if (playerCommand.equals(“prestige”)) {
for (int m = 0; m < 6; m++) {
if (c.getPA().playerLevel[m] <= 99) {
c.playerLevel[m] = 1;
c.playerXP[m] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel[0];
c.getPA().refreshSkill ;
if (c.getPA().playerLevel >= 99) {
return;
}
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
}
}
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:125: not a statement
c.getPA().refreshSkill ;

                                                     ^
